summary: WHILE DRIVING, THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS COME ON AND GO OFF ON THEIR OWN.  CONSUMER STATED THE PROBLEM IS REALLY NOTICABLE WHEN MAKING A TURN, CONSUMER HAS TO PLAY WITH TURN SIGNAL TO START AGAIN. CONSUMER FEEL THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS IF IN A DOWN POUR OF RAIN.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.
